title: Fivestar4everMVP
author: Fivestar4everMVP
created_time: December 16, 2022, 07:57:58 AMLast edit: December 16, 2023, 06:41:31 PM by Fivestar4everMVP
content: Welcome to RENEC Blockchain- a decentralized blockchain platform designed to enable creators to build experiences that provide to the billion users in the Web3 era. Founded in 2021, it is an open-source project currently run by the RENEC Foundation. We are looking for passionate ambassadors and supporters to help the RENEC brand grow stronger in the community of crypto and blockchain advocates.RULESThere is absolutely no need posting Proof of authentication(POA) here, just follow the guide below to understand how to join this program. 1. You must join the Renec Blockchain discord server https://discord.gg/d6ScGngN2x2. Stay active and achieve a minimum server level (discord chat) of level 10. (there a bot tracking this)3. Invite a minimum of 10 people using your unique discord invite link. (there is a bit tracking this)4. Fill this google form to enter the Ambassador program https://bit.ly/renecambassadorformPROGRAM STRUCTURE AND PAYMENTAmbassador rank 1-5, payment for each level.1. Ambassador rank 1 - Reward of 10$ RENEC/week2. Ambassador rank 2 - Reward of 20$ RENEC/week 3. Ambassador rank 3 - Reward of 40$ RENEC/week4. Ambassador rank 4 - Reward of 60$ RENEC/week 5. Ambassador rank 5 - Reward of 80$ RENEC/weekPROGRAM STRUCTURE/TASK FOR EACH AMBASSADOR RANKAmbassador Rank 1 (Common)Prerequisites/Requirement to enter the program:- 10 Discord invites- Level 10 or higher in Discord chat.Weekly tasks:- Use three twitter accounts to retweet all tweets from the official RENEC twitter account in that week. For example: RENEC tweets 3 posts > Ambassador must use 3 accounts, each retweets 3 posts = 9 retweets in total.- Daily RENEC tweet with personal Twitter, total 7 tweets/week.- 10 weekly RENEC shill posts on other crypto or NFT Discord servers- 5 weekly seeding comment promoting RENEC on any kind of social media rather than Twitter or DiscordRewards: $10 RENEC/weekAmbassador Rank 2 (Uncommon)Prerequisites/Requirement to enter the program:- 40 Discord invites- Level 15 or higher in Discord chatWeekly tasks:- Use three twitter accounts to like, retweet and comment on all tweets from official RENEC twitter account. For example: RENEC tweets 3 posts > Ambassador must use 3 accounts, each retweets 3 posts = 9 retweets in total.- Daily tweet on personal Twitter about RENEC, total 7 tweets/week.- 20 weekly RENEC shill posts on other crypto or NFT Discord servers -10 weekly seeding comment promoting RENEC on any kind of social media rather than Twitter or DiscordRewards: $20 RENEC/weekAmbassador Rank 3 (Rare)Prerequisites/Requirement to enter the program:- 80 Discord invites- Level 25 or higher in Discord chatWeekly tasks:- Use three twitter accounts to like, retweet and comment on all tweets from official RENEC twitter account. For example: RENEC tweets 3 posts > Ambassador must use 3 accounts, each retweets 3 posts = 9 retweets in total.- Daily tweet on personal Twitter about RENEC, total 7 tweets/week.- 40 weekly RENEC shill posts on other crypto or NFT Discord servers- 20 weekly seeding comment promoting RENEC on any kind of social media rather than Twitter or DiscordRewards: $40 RENEC/weekAmbassador Rank 4 (Epic)Prerequisites/requirement to enter the program:- 100 Discord invites- Level 30 or higher in Discord chatWeekly tasks:- Use three twitter accounts to like, retweet and comment on all tweets from official RENEC twitter account. For example: RENEC tweets 3 posts > Ambassador must use 3 accounts, each retweets 3 posts = 9 retweets in total.- Daily tweet on personal Twitter about RENEC, total 7 tweets/week.- 80 weekly RENEC shill posts on other crypto or NFT Discord servers- 40 weekly seeding comment promoting RENEC on any kind of social media rather than Twitter or DiscordRewards: $60 RENEC/weekAmbassador Rank 5 (Legendary)Prerequisites/Requirement to enter the program:- 150 Discord invites- Level 35 or higher in Discord chatWeekly tasks:- Use three twitter accounts to like, retweet and comment on all tweets from official RENEC twitter account. For example: RENEC tweets 3 posts > Ambassador must use 3 accounts, each retweets 3 posts = 9 retweets in total.- Daily tweet on personal Twitter about RENEC, total 7 tweets/week.- 100 weekly RENEC shill posts on other NFT Discord servers- 50 weekly seeding comment promoting RENEC on any kind of social media rather than Twitter or DiscordRewards: $80 RENEC/weekTIMELINE AND PAYMENT DISTRIBUTIONWeek runs from Monday to Sunday.Tasks will be reviewed weekly by the Renec Foundation team and participants will be rewarded bi-weekly by them.DISCLAIMERRENEC Foundation reserves the right to:- Do not award or retrieve the rewards if it is considered that the quality of the Ambassador's performance is not as required by the RENEC Foundation.- Remove the Ambassador who does not perform the right role and responsibilities from the program and replace with a new Ambassador selected from the wait list.Personal--- I am not affiliated with Renec team neither did they hire me to post this thread, it was my personal decision to share this Program with this community for those looking those for programs like this to earn from.- Join at your own risk, i wont be held responsible if you are denied payment for not following the rules or fulfilling the tasks as stated and required above.Any concerns or questions about this program or the project itself, feel free to post on this thread or in the Announcement thread, or better still, join the conversation on Discord

Thanks for sharing this opportunity with us bro.

comments.author: Fivestar4everMVP
comments.body: Quote from: Flangler1 on December 18, 2022, 09:26:09 PMIsn't this too much 100 weekly RENEC shill posts on other NFT Discord servers- 50 weekly seeding comment promoting RENEC on any kind of social media rather than Twitter or Discord No mate, 15 shills a day for 7 days is 105, shills is shills, it can be a one line sentence telling people to buy renec now or regret later, that kind of stuff, it's very simple to do, I myself I can up to 30 of such posts in a single day.And also, 50 weekly seeding comment on promoting Renec on any kind of social media is also very easy to achieve, but if you feel its too hard, then go for Ambassador rank 1, 2, or 3 which are with lesser task and lesser payIf you haven't joined this program yet, you are missing, it's a very easy program with great reward. Remember the criteria.. 1. Reach level 10 on the chat on discord 2. Invite 10 persons to join our server3. Ensure you have 3 a√ßtive Twitter account, number of followers doesn't matter, Infact you can have zero followers, it doesn't matter. 4. This is very important: fill the Google form you found in the OP. 5. When you meet these requirements, open a general ticket on discord in the ticket board of the server.That is all.Join our discord server on https://discord.gg/6FYdM3hJ

comments.body: RENECIAN AMBASSADOR PROGRAM UPDATEüì¢ The final list of 27 Ambassadors for RENEC have been found!Following the announcement of recruiting Ambassadors issued on December 16, 2022, we have found 27 members for the 1st Ambassador Program. They are the first 27 members to register and complete the prerequisites to join the Program.Congrats to the 27 Ambassadors who have made it thus far:@‚ù§üò°Lord Libertyüò°‚ù§#7472@Morakinyo#2089@Favy Renec@Megafx#4900@westmainz#8286@Ynca [üåé RENEC Lord üëë]@yemight626#8689@f üòÅ‚ù§#7584@JAY¬≤@Uwemjnr#3249@Victorz01#9050@User1#3276@snazzy#6221@JossyGift@Mremeka | Renec@Okdanath#5398@Vinahdigitals#1254@its.your.boy#3809@TeeClassy29@fcus@Sak1e_#9319@sodiqrichie#8996@Kumlapa56#2002@EdikanFriday@FREDRICKFAVOUR@Gaius@inv_Hugopatty#2925Users who have completed the prerequisites but are not on the list of these 27 Ambassadors will be on the Waiting List and will be prioritized in the next Ambassador recruitment sessions.Please continue to follow the social media pages of RENEC Blockchain, especially the Discord channel to get update on the latest information about the Ambassador Program in the future. Thanks all for the supportüòâüôÇMore opportunities on the way. üí™üí™$RENEC will moonüöÄüöÄ
